title: Microsoft Brings Facebook and Twitter Features in Outlook.com
text: Microsoft has just announced that its email platform Outlook.com will receive a number of improvements inspired from Facebook and Twitter in order to help better manage emails and conversations. In a blog post today, the company has revealed that both likes and mentions, used in Facebook and Twitter, respectively, will debut in Outlook.com in order to share and collaborate messages between contacts much faster than before.
